parameters: I read we can use the Hero Points we collect to buy equipment and training scrolls later in the game.
Oh, and SP - or Skill Points - lets us use our special skills. The fastest way to charge SP is to Defend or Attack.
This game seems really easy so far.
Why is this game so hard?
This game seems really easy so far.
Ah. The default setting is 50% Difficulty. If you want more of a challenge, go to Options on the Menu screen.
You can increase the Difficulty up to 200%! Increasing the Difficulty will also help you earn more Hero Points!
Why is this game so hard?
Hmmm. Have you checked what Skills everyone can use? And don't forget about healing Items.
Leaves of Healing can heal someone when they're still on their feet. Water of Life can raise someone back to life.
Also, check the Reference section of the Menu for a quick explanation of Enemy Skills.
If you want to make the game even easier, you can to Options in your Menu and change the Difficulty. It goes as low as 25%.
You found the painting "Empyrean Light" (1867) by Gustave Dore!
The word "Heaven" means "Sky" or anything above the earth.
The word "Heaven" means "Sky" or anything above the earth!
The word "Heaven" means "Sky" or anything above the earth.
The word "Heaven" means "Sky" or anything above the earth.
Hey! So here we are. Nice character.
Why, thank you! I used to have a haircut like this.
Anyway, I've been looking at this body lying here.
I think it's a demon, or Fallen Angel, going by the theme of the first story we're on.
It has a club and a shield we can loot. Which one do you want?
Okay. I'll carry the shield then. The best defense is a good... defense!
Here you go. Now you're part of the club!
The game also starts us off with 2 Leaves of Healing and 2 Water of Life to share.
Pretty handy if we get into trouble! You can view them under Item in your Menu.
Afraid you're going to get hit? I'd rather go out swinging myself, so I'm glad to take the club.
The game also start us off with 2 Leaves of Healing and 2 Water of Life to share.
Pretty handy if we get into trouble! You can view them under Item in your Menu.

This strange looking creature appears to be wounded and is not moving.
Oh, you didn't think I was dead, did you? How silly! I'm IMMORTAL!
Greetings, Kota! I see you've met the humans.
But... how did you get a spear?
One of the rebels must have dropped it. Seemed useful.
I'm Michael! The King sent me to bring you to Him, but it looks as if Kota found you first.
Before we move on, let me show you a new fighting tactic in case we run into any more of Lucifer's crew.
It's called Counter Attack. When someone attacks you, you dodge, then wham! Haha! You hit them when they're open!
Not that you should want to hit anyone.
I guess I'm getting carried away by the excitement of battle.
I didn't expect Lucifer to refuse the King's summons.
He said he didn't need to appear before the King to answer for anything, that he was his own ruler now.
Let's head east to the King's courtyard. I'll do my best to draw attacks away from you for as long as I can.
Use the Party tab in your Menu to change the battle order or to add new Allies to your battle party when they become available.

You found the painting "Michael and Satan" (1636) by Guido Reni!
"Michael" means "Who is like God?" He is known in Scripture as a _ angel.
Michael is mostly known as a warrior.
Michael is mostly known as a warrior.
Michael is mostly known as a warrior.
Michael is mostly known as a warrior!
I'm Kota. I'm perfectly friendly, I assure you. But I'm hiding. Heaven has turned dangerous these last few minutes.
I'm Kota. I'm perfectly friendly, I assure you. But I'm hiding. Heaven has turned dangerous these last few minutes.
I saw Michael's group order Lucifer's group to appear before the Throne.
Lucifer's group refused, and then they started fighting!
Michael - and most of the rest of us - are very excited for God to make the new world and humans.
I'm so excited, myself, that I've started trying on the looks of some of the new creatures God is going to make.
Lucifer wonders why God would make humans when He already has angels.
Lucifer thinks it's wrong that we would have to serve the humans since we were the first ones made.
Lucifer wonders why God would make humans when He already has angels.
Lucifer thinks it's wrong that we would have to serve the humans since we were the first ones made.
Michael - and most of the rest of us - are very excited for God to make the new world and humans.
I'm so excited, myself, that I've started trying on the looks of some of the new creatures God is going to make.
I'm not sure why you're here already, but I would try to get to God before one of Lucifer's group tries to attack you.
I'm an angel, of course. We can change our appearance to look however we want.
Press X to open or close your Menu.
